p: Dermoscopy is a non-invasive technique that is used to aid the diagnosis of skin tumors and other inflammatory dermatoses ( 4, 5) In our clinical work, we found the APD is characteristic under dermoscopy. To the best of our knowledge, the dermoscopic features of APD have been described in three previous case reports ( 6â€“ 8). Here we analyze and report the dermoscopic feature in a series of 39 patients with APD.
